content:
Next week I will be taking the Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA) exam.

Today my focus is on storage.

Storage - PVs, PVCs, etc.

Managing Kubernetes Storage is listed first in the CKA Curriculum v1.32 and a critical skill when persisting data with stateful applications.

Local Kubernetes Environment

This post is a work in progress…
